GK19padnscxu:4814: nayanti kim api mlānim uṣṇā niḥśvasita-ūrmayas+
GK19padnscxu:4842: mṝṇāla-valayaṃ haste vahati tvāṃ ca cetasi PNc_16.38
GK19padnscxu:4878: yathā sakhī vas+kim api prapannā vidhurāṃ daśām tathā tvam api mām evaṃ
GK19padnscxu:4881: āśvāsayitum arhasi vayam ete ca hema-abjam
GK19padnscxu:4998: daśana-jyotsnayā diśām vidhāya satkriyām evam asurendras tam abravīt
GK19padnscxu:5015: kim artham asi kathyatām arthināṃ vyarthatām eti na jātu prārthanā mama PNc_16.83
GK19padnscxu:5062: yat-yat+asti+iha pātāle ratnaṃ kva cana kiṃ cana
GK19padnscxu:5073: itas+eva nivartadhvaṃ vartadhvaṃ vacane mama avaṭe kim iti kṣeptum ātmānaṃ yūyam udyatās+
GK19padnscxu:5081: kim adya+api vilambate āyātu svayam ādātum
GK19padnscxu:5105: kim ādidevaṃ kaṃsāriṃ dhiṅ martyas+iti manyase [[sandānitakam]]
GK19padnscxu:5110: asurendra na śakyase na ratna-sūcim ākraṣṭum ayaskāntasya yogyatā
GK19padnscxu:5272: na śekatus tasya gatiṃ niroddhuṃ vidyādhara-indra-uraga-rāja-putrau
GK19padnscxu:5275: dos-daṇḍa-kaṇḍūtim atha+asya hartum udbhrūlataṃ bhūpatinā niyuktas+
GK19padnscxu:5283: sas+raṃhasā saṃmukham āpatantam rurodha taṃ bāṇa-paraṃparābhis+
GK19padnscxu:5285: Viśvāṅkuśas+sat-kavace mumoca vakṣaḥsthale haimam atha+asya bāṇam
GK19padnscxu:5293: udyat-krudhas+paddhatim antakasya maurvīṃ pṝṣatkeṇa ramāṅgadasya ciccheda gīrvāṇa-ripos+tanūjas+
GK19padnscxu:5361: muhus+prajānām adhipena gāḍham ākṝṣyamāṇasya śarāsanasya dviṣadvadhārambha-vidhau gabhīras+
GK19padnscxu:5372: atyunnate mūrdhni mahāsurasya reje tarām añjana-parvatasya
GK19padnscxu:5419: devasya ca tridiva-puṣpa-mayaṃ papāta mālyaṃ śirasi+asura-vairi-purandhri-muktam
GK19padnscxu:5454: arghyas+satāṃ sas+bahis+eva niveśya sainyam devas+aviśat+vinayavān puram agra-yāyi-
GK19padnscxu:5465: tasmin smara-ullasita-jṝmbhikayā kayā cit muktā muhus+vibudha-sindhu-kalinda-kanyā-
GK19padnscxu:5467: vācāla-ratna-valayā sa-vilāsam asmin nikṣipya kā+api nava-mauktika-lāja-muṣṭim
GK19padnscxu:5469: dīrgha-īkṣaṇā kim iva na trapayā cakāra PNc_18.6
GK19padnscxu:5497: pratyupta-kalpa-taru-pallavam eṣa pāṇim ādāsyate nṝpatis+adya śaśiprabhāyās+
GK19padnscxu:5501: śrī-hāṭakeśvaras+iti prathitasya tuṅgam agre dadarśa maṇi-mandiram indu-maules+ kulakam
GK19padnscxu:5516: ratna-aṅkurasya karaṇīṃ vidhurātanoti maulau sadā+eva bhavatas+bhava-bheda-kartus+
GK19padnscxu:5526: te te yam eva kila vāk-maya-sāgarasya
GK19padnscxu:5534: na+astram+na bhasma na jaṭā na kapāla-dāma
GK19padnscxu:5536: na+ukṣā+viṣaṃ na dayitā+api na yatra rūpam+
GK19padnscxu:5573: citre niveśitas+iva+atha yaśobhaṭena smitvā sa-vismayam asūcyata pārthivāya PNc_18.32
GK19padnscxu:5648: yat+dīyate tava na tādṝśam asti kiṃcit+
GK19padnscxu:5658: sa-anugraheṇa mama ca+idam adāyi tena PNc_18.52
GK19padnscxu:5678: sindhos+taṭe sas+padam eka-pade cakāra śṝṅge tadā ca bhagavān aravinda-bandhus+
GK19padnscxu:5728: devena+atha sva-mantri-pravara-cira-dhṝtā sāhasāṅkena dīrghe rohat-jyā-ghāta-rekhe punas+api nidadhe doṣṇi sāmrājya-lakṣmīs+
